documentation.content: Memory usage has exceeded 85% for over 5 minutes on either the API or web containers. This could indicate a memory leak or insufficient resources. Check container logs and consider restarting the affected services or increasing memory allocation.

Memory usage has exceeded the threshold for over 5 minutes. This alert will notify:
- Email: lexuanhuy1234@gmail.com
- Slack: #devops-alerts
- Microsoft Teams: DevOps channel

Possible causes:
- Memory leak in application code
- Insufficient memory allocation
- Unusual traffic patterns

Review container metrics in the GKE dashboard for more details.
